description:
Like fan fiction come to life, The O.C.'s Seth Cohen has asked Gossip Girl's Blair Waldorf to marry him. Star reports that Adam Brody and Leighton Meester are engaged, after less than a year of dating. 就像是同人小说走进现实！《橘子郡男孩》的塞斯·科恩向《绯闻女孩》的布莱尔·华道夫求婚了！据《Star》杂志报道，两位偶像演员亚当·布罗迪和莉顿·梅斯特在交往不到一年后宣布订婚。

According to the magazine, the two had been talking about marriage, but Brody's proposal was a surprise. The same source says that they're planning on getting married some time next year. 据该杂志报道，此前二人曾经就已谈及婚嫁，但布罗迪的这次求婚确实是一个很大的惊喜。同一消息来源表示，他们打算在明年举行婚礼。

The two met while they were shooting The Oranges together, but only started dating about 10 months ago.布罗迪和布莱尔相识于合作出演的电影《橘子》，但大概10个月前两人才开始交往。
